page.title: 06LIFE-STYLE
page.content: Of the 100 people we surveyed we found the greatest number to be {Commuters.} We fond even some of the local shops were staffed by people outwith our area. The people travelling into London on the whole preferred to use the train as parking in the city is a problem. Others travelled by car. Most people worked within a 40 km radius of their home. We met 3 people who travelled over 60 km to work each day. They liked the area and didn't wish to disrupt their children's education so chose not to move. Some of the{locals}in the village see the people on these new estates as rather withdrawn from village life. Some said that the village of{Farnham {Common}was close resembling a {dormitory}town for London,Windsor and Slough.
